mapper.select: SELECT sa.id as id, sa.area_id as areaId, sa.agent_name as agentName FROM sys_agent sa WHERE sa.area_id = #{areaId} AND sa.agent_name = #{agentName} AND sa.deleted_time = 0

SELECT agent.id AS id, agent.parent_id AS parentId, agent.agent_name AS agentName, agent.`level` AS `level`, agent.agent_order AS agentOrder, agent.description AS description, agent.mobile AS mobile, agent.email AS email, agent.address AS address, agent.`status` AS `status`, agent.remark AS remark, area.area_id AS areaId, area.area_code AS areaCode, area.area_name AS areaName FROM sys_agent agent INNER JOIN sys_area area ON area.area_id = agent.area_id WHERE agent.id = #{id}
